Ruby on Rails P1

Getting started

Route = URL + http verb (GET, POST, PUT/PATCH, DELETE)

GET = find

POST = add

PUT/PATCH = update

DELETE = delete

User1 → Router → CONTROLLER → View → Back to User1

      MacOS Questions and Answers Collection

      1. Permissions: Why do I always have to type ‘sudo’ before every command?

      Use sudo su or sudo -i to get an interactive root shell.

      1. Launch Sublime Text 2 from the Mac OS X Terminal

      https://gist.github.com/artero/1236170

      Google App Engine SDK Path

      Where is the Google App Engine SDK path on OSX?

      Answer:

      /usr/local/google_appengine

      that’s a symlink that links to the SDK.
